welcome_message_body: Welcome to Arcos de Valdevez, where the charm of the old town meets the breathtaking natural landscapes of the Peneda-Gerês National Park. We invite you to immerse yourself in our rich history, taste our delicious cuisine, and discover the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Braga Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vigo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Vigo Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
